title: Aural set, Sextet No 1 - second phrase melody

content.description: You will hear an excerpt consisting of two long phrases from a string sextet. Before listening to each section for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: Compared to the first phrase, the melody of the second phrase is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements
